useCase.name: Student performs Quiz Activities
useCase.trigger: Student interacts with the application to perform quiz-related activities.

mainSequence.step: Student navigates to the login page.
Student enters their ID to log in.
Student is redirected to the dashboard upon successful login.
Student clicks on "Start Quiz" in the dashboard.
Student is taken to the quiz page.
Student submits answers for the quiz.
Student clicks on "Practice Quiz" in the dashboard.
